scripts.clean:all: rimraf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules pos/apps/electron/node_modules pos/packages/server/node_modules ~/.electron-gyp
scripts.pos:clean-rebuild: npm run clean:all && npm install && npm --workspace pos/apps/electron run rebuild:native:c20

scripts.db:exec: docker compose exec db psql -U kgolf -d kgolf_app
